verses.verse: <S%G3668>Likewise,<s%> you <S%G1135>wives,<s%> be in <S%G5293>subjection<s%> to <S%G3588>your<s%> <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G435>husbands;<s%> that, <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G544>obey<s%> not the <S%G3056>word,<s%> they <S%G2532>also<s%> may <S%G427>without<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> be <S%G2770>won<s%> by the <S%G391>conversation<s%> of the <S%G1135>wives;<s%>
While they <S%G2029>behold<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G53>chaste<s%> <S%G391>conversation<s%> coupled with <S%G5401>fear.<s%>

<S%G3739>Whose<s%> <S%G2889>adorning<s%> let it not be that <S%G1855>outward<s%> <S%G2889>adorning<s%> of <S%G1708>plaiting<s%> the <S%G2359>hair,<s%> and of <S%G4025>wearing<s%> of <S%G5553>gold,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> of <S%G1745>putting<s%> <S%G1745>on<s%> of <S%G2440>apparel;<s%>

But let it be the <S%G2927>hidden<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> of the <S%G2588>heart,<s%> in that which is not <S%G862>corruptible,<s%> even the ornament of a <S%G4239>meek<s%> and <S%G2272>quiet<s%> <S%G4151>spirit,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> is in the <S%G1799>sight<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G4185>great<s%> <S%G4185>price.<s%>

For <S%G3779>after<s%> <S%G3779>this<s%> <S%G3779>manner<s%> in the <S%G4218>old<s%> <S%G4218>time<s%> the <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G1135>women<s%> <S%G2532>also,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G1679>trusted<s%> in <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2885>adorned<s%> <S%G1438>themselves,<s%> being in <S%G5293>subjection<s%> to their <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G435>husbands:<s%>

<S%G5613>Even<s%> as <S%G4564>Sara<s%> <S%G5219>obeyed<s%> <S%G11>Abraham,<s%> <S%G2564>calling<s%> him <S%G2962>lord:<s%> <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G5043>daughters<s%> you are, as long as you <S%G15>do<s%> <S%G15>well,<s%> and are not <S%G5399>afraid<s%> with <S%G1536>any<s%> <S%G4423>amazement.<s%>

<S%G3664>Likewise,<s%> you <S%G435>husbands,<s%> <S%G4924>dwell<s%> with them <S%G2596>according<s%> to <S%G1108>knowledge,<s%> <S%G632>giving<s%> <S%G5092>honor<s%> to the <S%G1134>wife,<s%> as to the <S%G772>weaker<s%> <S%G4632>vessel,<s%> and as being <S%G4789>heirs<s%> <S%G4789>together<s%> of the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2222>life;<s%> that <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4335>prayers<s%> be not <S%G1581>hindered.<s%>

<S%G5056>Finally,<s%> be you <S%G3956>all<s%> of <S%G3675>one<s%> <S%G3675>mind,<s%> having <S%G4835>compassion<s%> one of <S%G4835>another,<s%> <S%G5361>love<s%> as <S%G5361>brothers,<s%> be <S%G2155>pitiful,<s%> be <S%G5391>courteous:<s%>

Not <S%G591>rendering<s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%> for <S%G2556>evil,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G3059>railing<s%> for <S%G3059>railing:<s%> but <S%G5121>contrariwise<s%> <S%G2129>blessing;<s%> <S%G1492>knowing<s%> that you are <S%G1519>thereunto<s%> <S%G5124><s%> <S%G2564>called,<s%> that you should <S%G2816>inherit<s%> a <S%G2129>blessing.<s%>

For he that <S%G2309>will<s%> <S%G25>love<s%> <S%G2222>life,<s%> and <S%G1492>see<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G2250>days,<s%> let him <S%G3973>refrain<s%> his <S%G1100>tongue<s%> from <S%G2556>evil,<s%> and his <S%G5491>lips<s%> that they <S%G2980>speak<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G1388>guile:<s%>
Let him <S%G1578>eschew<s%> <S%G2556>evil,<s%> and <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G18>good;<s%> let him <S%G2212>seek<s%> <S%G1515>peace,<s%> and <S%G1377>ensue<s%> it.

For the <S%G3788>eyes<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> are <S%G1909>over<s%> the <S%G1342>righteous,<s%> and his <S%G3775>ears<s%> are open to their <S%G1162>prayers:<s%> but the <S%G4383>face<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> is <S%G1909>against<s%> them that <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G2556>evil.<s%>
And <S%G5101>who<s%> is he that will <S%G2559>harm<s%> you, <S%G1437>if<s%> you be <S%G3402>followers<s%> of that which is <S%G18>good?<s%>

But and if you <S%G3958>suffer<s%> for <S%G1343>righteousness'<s%> sake, <S%G3107>happy<s%> are you: and be not <S%G5399>afraid<s%> of their <S%G5401>terror,<s%> <S%G3366>neither<s%> be <S%G5015>troubled;<s%>

But <S%G37>sanctify<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> in <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2588>hearts:<s%> and be <S%G2092>ready<s%> <S%G104>always<s%> to give an <S%G627>answer<s%> to <S%G3956>every<s%> man that <S%G154>asks<s%> you a <S%G3056>reason<s%> of the <S%G1680>hope<s%> that is in you with <S%G4240>meekness<s%> and <S%G5401>fear:<s%>

<S%G2192>Having<s%> a <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G4893>conscience;<s%> that, <S%G1722>whereas<s%> <S%G3759><s%> they <S%G2635>speak<s%> <S%G2635>evil<s%> of you, as of <S%G2555>evildoers,<s%> they may be <S%G2617>ashamed<s%> that falsely <S%G1908>accuse<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G391>conversation<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

For it is <S%G2909>better,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> the <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> be so, that you <S%G3958>suffer<s%> for <S%G15>well<s%> <S%G15>doing,<s%> <S%G2228>than<s%> for <S%G2554>evil<s%> <S%G2554>doing.<s%>

For <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> has <S%G530>once<s%> <S%G3958>suffered<s%> for <S%G266>sins,<s%> the <S%G1342>just<s%> for the <S%G94>unjust,<s%> that he might <S%G4317>bring<s%> us to <S%G2316>God,<s%> being <S%G2289>put<s%> to <S%G2289>death<s%> in the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> but <S%G2227>quickened<s%> by the <S%G4151>Spirit:<s%>
By <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> he <S%G4198>went<s%> and <S%G2784>preached<s%> to the <S%G4151>spirits<s%> in <S%G5438>prison;<s%>

Which <S%G4218>sometime<s%> were <S%G544>disobedient,<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> <S%G530>once<s%> the <S%G3115>long-suffering<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1551>waited<s%> in the <S%G2250>days<s%> of <S%G3575>Noah,<s%> while the <S%G2787>ark<s%> was a <S%G2680>preparing,<s%> <S%G1519>wherein<s%> <S%G3757><s%> <S%G3641>few,<s%> that is, <S%G3638>eight<s%> <S%G5590>souls<s%> were <S%G1295>saved<s%> by <S%G5204>water.<s%>

The <S%G499>like<s%> <S%G499>figure<s%> <S%G3739>whereunto<s%> even <S%G908>baptism<s%> does <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G4982>save<s%> us (not the <S%G595>putting<s%> <S%G595>away<s%> of the <S%G4509>filth<s%> of the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> but the <S%G1906>answer<s%> of a <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G4893>conscience<s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%>) by the <S%G386>resurrection<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ:<s%>

<S%G3739>Who<s%> is <S%G4198>gone<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> and is <S%G1722>on<s%> the <S%G1188>right<s%> hand of <S%G2316>God;<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> and <S%G1849>authorities<s%> and <S%G1411>powers<s%> being <S%G5293>made<s%> <S%G5293>subject<s%> to him.
